Usage/ExamplesÂ¶

The package ships with the tyaml cli command. This is a wrapper around the templated_yaml.api module and allows you to do everything either programatically or from the command line. The following examples will use the cli and then give an example of embedding templated_yaml into another program.

  • Command-Line Interface
    • Render
    • Version
